text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi Good Sir.  Do not mistake because opening Indian Railways lot of tourist will book ticket for haridwar and char dham yatra.  till now covid19 has not left us.  please ensure all public.  wait till 15th june 2020 after that allow them till that time wait and watch do not go on.
